mapper.sql: id, merchant_id, channel_no, war_id, environment, type, is_success, desc_content, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, version
mapper.insert: insert into war_log (id, merchant_id, channel_no, war_id, environment, type, is_success, desc_content, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, version) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{environment,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isSuccess,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 0)

mapper.update:
update war_log
merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
war_id = #{warId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
environment = #{environment,jdbcType=TINYINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_success = #{isSuccess,jdbcType=TINYINT},
desc_content = #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = now(), version = version+1
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update war_log set merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, war_id = #{warId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, environment = #{environment,jdbcType=TINYINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_success = #{isSuccess,jdbcType=TINYINT}, desc_content = #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = now(), version = version+1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from war_log order by create_time desc
